text: Europa Universalis IV (EU4 in short) is a video game in the Europa Universalis set of games. It is made by Paradox Interactive. It came out in August 2013. The game is a strategy game. Players can play as a country between the years of 1444 and 1821. Players can trade, build colonies, and fight other countries in war. == References == Category:2013 video games Category:Linux games Category:MacOS games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Real-time strategy video games Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games developed in Sweden Category:Windows games
title: Europa Universalis IV
